Package org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game

Class NPGVerifier

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game.NPGVerifier
public class NPGVerifier
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides a function to verify a memoryless solution for a parity game.
Author:
Yu-Shiang Hwang, cleaned up by Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Method Details

    • verify

      public boolean verify​(Game game, Solution<MemorylessStrategy> sol)
      Verifies the correctness of a specified memoryless solution for a specified parity game.
      Parameters:
      game - a parity game
      sol - a memoryless solution of the specified parity game
      Returns:
      true if the solution is correct
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the game is not a valid parity game
